name: Cookie Roll
description:
This is Team Syntaxica's submission to SEA Game Jam+ !

The theme is "Connections" and in this game you prevent Cookie from falling to his death by connecting blocks together. But make sure you connect pieces that fit together or they won't connect

Our team is composed of:

Programmers

- Juanito Jose "Bocchi-Dev" Padilla

- Zeigfred Carmona

- Ron Macariola

Artists

- Yoshi Mae "Hyoei" Pahilanga (https://twitter.com/hyoeiart

www.instagram.com/yoshimae.p)

- Shane "Yin" Chen (https://twitter.com/AshenMao?s=09)
